医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
与心脏死亡增加有关的复合热浪在化合物热浪 - 热瓦斯（Heatwaves）期间，心脏死亡大大增加，在白天和过夜，在美国心脏病学院的旗舰杂志JACC的一项新研究中，温度均升高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/compound-heatwaves-linked to-to-to-to-to-increard-cardiac-deaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/compound-heatwaves-link- to to in-to-increard-to-increard-cardiac-deaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0da1ae83-0744-473b-9b-9b38-27f97772 edc1c Tue, 01 Apr 2025 15:03:24 -0400 Compound heatwaves linked to increased cardiac deaths
AI驱动的研究旨在提高IVF成功率目前，通过IVF治疗的成功怀孕数量在全球范围内为30％至50％。通过使用AI分析诊所实验室的环境状况，马尔默大学的研究人员认为，他们可以提高成功结果的机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/ai-driven-driven-research-aims-to-improve-improve-imvf-success-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/ai-driven-driven-research-aims-to-improve-improve-imvf-success-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc0ae583-4471-4197-BA88-E71DFC0215CB Tue, 01 Apr 2025 14:50:26 -0400 AI-driven research aims to improve IVF success rates
怀孕可能会提供一些防止长期共同的保护怀孕可能会提供一些保护，以防止长期共同发展，这是一项由Weill Cornell医学，罗切斯特大学医学中心，犹他大学卫生大学和路易斯安那州公共卫生研究所领导的一项新研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/pregnancy-may-provide-some-protection-against-long-covid.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/pregnancy-may-provide-some-protection-protection-against-long-covid.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A6D2851A-81BB-43C0-8597-F42555511ABA3F Tue, 01 Apr 2025 14:43:04 -0400 Pregnancy may provide some protection against Long COVID
纽约市和巴尔的摩科学家授予心血管和糖尿病研究补助金一位位于纽约市的医师科学家，通过研究细胞和分子影响疾病和巴尔的摩的流行病学家的方式来探索改善健康的方法，他们致力于确定改善糖尿病患者筛查，诊断和患者护理的方法，是美国最新的美国心脏病协会的奖项。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/nyc-and-baltimore-scientists-award-warded grants-forter-for-cardiescular and-cardiescular-and-diabecular-and-diabetes-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/nyc-and-baltimore-scientists-award-warded-grants-forn-for-for-cardiescular-and-diabascular-and-diabetes-rasearch.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fdd732b2-3e59-4818-9006-4ae7bb65cdf0 Tue, 01 Apr 2025 14:32:19 -0400 NYC and Baltimore scientists awarded grants for cardiovascular and diabetes research

研究将儿童空气污染暴露到较弱的大脑连接由“ La Caixa”基金会支持的中心巴塞罗那全球卫生研究所（Isglobal）领导的一项新研究发现，在童年早期和童年时期暴露于空气污染水平较高的儿童之间，关键大脑区域之间的联系较弱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/study-links-childhood-airhood-air-pollution-air-pollution-pobure-weaker-brain-brain-connections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/study-links-childhood-airhood-air-pollution-air-pollution-expobure-weaker-brain-brain-connections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c2bfb69-6583-4acf-9c34-634-634d4ef6f96d Tue, 01 Apr 2025 13:50:36 -0400 Study links childhood air pollution exposure to weaker brain connections

研究人员发现将母体炎症与婴儿延迟神经发育联系起来的机制由纳戈亚大学（Nagoya University）在日本的医学院领导的研究小组发现了一种潜在的机制，该机制将母体炎症与婴儿的神经发育延迟联系起来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/researchers-uncover-mechanism-link-link--mertalnal-inflammation-to-delayed-neyrevelodment-infants-infants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/researchers-uncover-mechanism-link-link-maternal-inflammation-to-delayed-nerayed-neyrevenderment-infants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d148517a-151f-4B16-BEAF-1631FA5A5A5CE8 Tue, 01 Apr 2025 12:59:03 -0400 Researchers uncover mechanism linking maternal inflammation to delayed neurodevelopment in infants
